channel-type.label: Wallbox Available
channel-type.description: Indicates if the Wallbox is attached. Check your Wallbox ID in offline case

channel-type.label: Sun Mode
channel-type.description: Activate / Deactivate Sun Mode. Off case takes Grid Power to ensure highest possible charging

channel-type.label: Wallbox Charging Aborted
channel-type.description: Indicates if Wallbox charging was aborted

channel-type.label: Schuko Socket On
channel-type.description: If your Wallbox has an additional Schuko Socket it provides state ON or OFF

channel-type.label: Schuko Socket Plugged
channel-type.description: If your Wallbox has an additional Schuko Socket it provides plugged state ON or OFF

channel-type.label: Schuko Socket Locked
channel-type.description: If your Wallbox has an additional Schuko Socket it provides locked state ON or OFF

channel-type.label: Schuko 16A Relay On
channel-type.description: Indicates if Schuko 16A Relay is ON

channel-type.label: 3-Phase Charging
channel-type.description: Indicates if 3-phase charging is activated. If OFF 1-phase charging is activated
